definition: insects having usually a single anterior pair of functional wings with the posterior pair reduced to small knobbed structures and mouth parts adapted for sucking, lapping or piercing; a fly
details:
noun
- insects having usually a single anterior pair of functional wings with the posterior pair reduced to small knobbed structures and mouth parts adapted for sucking, lapping or piercing; a fly
= example: insects having usually a single anterior pair of functional wings with the posterior pair reduced to small knobbed structures and mouth parts adapted for sucking, lapping or piercing; a fly
= synonyms: dipterous insect
